frontmatter.title: TIL: How to set security headers for Gatsby Develop
frontmatter.description: If, for any reason, you need to run gatsby develop and set security headers. Using advanced proxying is the way to go.

faq.question: How can I set security headers for the Gatsby Develop script?
faq.answer: You can use Gatsby's developMiddleware in gatsby-config.js to set different headers on the response object
